channel.title: CVE Feed for Chamilo -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Chamilo -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-3533|2024-08-02T06:55:03.594Z -- chamilo -- chamilo
item.description: Path traversal in file upload functionality in `/main/webservices/additional_webservices.php` in Chamilo LMS <= v1.11.20 allows unauthenticated attackers to perform stored cross-site scripting attacks and obtain remote code execution via arbitrary file write.

item.title: CVE-2023-3368|2024-08-02T06:55:03.399Z -- chamilo -- chamilo
item.description: Command injection in `/main/webservices/additional_webservices.php` in Chamilo LMS <= v1.11.20 allows unauthenticated attackers to obtain remote code execution via improper neutralisation of special characters. This is a bypass of CVE-2023-34960.

item.title: CVE-2023-3545|2024-08-02T07:01:57.437Z -- chamilo -- chamilo
item.description: Improper sanitisation in `main/inc/lib/fileUpload.lib.php` in Chamilo LMS <= v1.11.20 on Windows and Apache installations allows unauthenticated attackers to bypass file upload security protections and obtain remote code execution via uploading of `.htaccess` file. This vulnerability may be exploited by privileged attackers or chained with unauthenticated arbitrary file write vulnerabilities, such as CVE-2023-3533, to achieve remote code execution.
